The Mahoney Nurse Scrub Shirt is made for medical professionals looking for an accommodating and comfortable fit. The shirt has a pocket and strips of fabric forming subtle geometric patterns on the right shoulder. Moisture wicking and anti-stain fabric makes this shirt ready to withstand long shifts and repeated washing.
